projects.name: Evolving AI Learning Management System
projects.description: An AI-native Learning Management System using agentic LLMs, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and evolving Knowledge Graphs. Built with a distributed microservices architecture supporting multimodal inputs (voice, image), personalized concept delivery, curriculum-aligned guidance, and scalable inference workflows.

projects.name: PubTPort
projects.description: An intelligent transportation recommendation mobile application that analyzes user context to suggest optimal transportation modes.

projects.name: PlaceMents
projects.description: A campus recruitment workflow system designed to streamline hiring processes, improve recruiterâ€“student interaction and optimize placement outcomes.

projects.name: Antovid
projects.description: A public-health mobile application providing real-time pandemic protocol guidance and safety recommendations to support community well-being.

projects.name: Object Distance Estimation and Differentiation App
projects.description: A computer vision application that detects and differentiates object distances using OpenCV-based image processing and advanced depth map computation techniques.
